property.name: Text
property.value: If this skill test is successful, ready an Ally asset at your location and heal 1 damage or 1 horror from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only as your first action. Deal 1 damage to an enemy engaged with you. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (4 supplies). If First Aid has no supplies, discard it. η Spend 1 supply: Heal 1 damage and 1 horror from an investigator or Ally asset in your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this skill test is successful, the investigator performing this test searches the top 3 cards of his or her deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play only during your turn. Attach to your location. Attached location gains: "θ Exhaust Shortcut: Move (to a connecting location)."

property.name: Text
property.value: Commit only to a skill test you are performing. As an additional cost to commit "Watch this!" to a skill test, spend up to 3 resources. If you succeed by 1 or more, gain twice that many resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 ammo). η Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 ή for this attack. If you succeed by 1 or more, this attack deals +1 damage. Once per turn, if you succeed by 3 or more, you may take an additional action this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to commit Torrent of Power to a skill test, spend up to 3 charges from among assets you control. For each charge spent in this way, Torrent of Power gains ά ΰ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 charges). θ Exhaust Scrying and spend 1 charge: Look at the top 3 cards of any investigator's deck, or the encounter deck. Return them to the top of that deck, in any order. If a Terror or Omen card is among the looked-at cards, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose an exhausted non-Elite enemy at your location and test ί (X), where X is that enemy's evade value. If you succeed, defeat that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose an Ally asset with printed resource cost X in any player's discard pile. Put that asset into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gain 4 resources or place 4 supply tokens among assets controlled by investigators at your location, or any combination thereof.

property.name: Text
property.value: Easy / Standard α: -X. X is the number of locations away from the starting location you are (max 5). β: -2. If this token is revealed during an attack, and this skill test is successful, this attack deals 1 less damage. γ: -2. If there is a ready Ghoul or Geist enemy at your location, it attacks you (if there is more than one, choose one). δ: -3. If you fail, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Ghoul or Geist enemy and draw it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hard / Expert α: -X. X is the number of locations away from the starting location you are. β: -3. If this token is revealed during an attack and this skill test is successful, this attack deals no damage. γ: -3. If there is a Ghoul or Geist enemy at your location, it readies and attacks you (if there is more than one, choose one). δ: -4. If you fail, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Ghoul or Geist enemy and draw it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each location is connected to each location adjacent to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - The starting location.Hunter. Retaliate.While Specter of Death is exhausted, it takes 1 less damage from each attack made against it.Forced - After you fail a skill test while attempting to evade Specter of Death: It attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each location is connected to each location adjacent to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - Find The Man in the Pallid Mask. He is somewhere in the Catacombs. (Do not advance until you are instructed.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn the set-aside The Man in the Pallid Mask weakness in the Tomb of Shadows (instead of its normal spawn location). Check the Campaign Log. If Ishimaru Haruko is not listed under "VIPs Slain," search the collection for Ishimaru Haruko (Just Skin and Bones) and spawn her at the starting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - "Tell us how to stop the path from opening!" If The Man in the Pallid Mask is defeated, advance. Objective - "What is he trying to show us?" Investigators in the Tomb of Shadows may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If The Man in the Pallid Mask was defeated: The Stranger drops to one knee, visibly wounded. Your knuckles whiten with anger, and you shout, "We know about Carcosa and Hastur. Now tell us how to stop this madness!" The Stranger digs his fingers into the cold stone floor, and the catacombs shake… Mark two Conviction in your Campaign Log. Remove The Man in the Pallid Mask from the game. Advance to Act 3a - The Way Out. If you spent clues to advance: Recognizing that the Stranger poses no immediate danger to you, you study your surroundings and the strange shadows twist and distort once more, revealing a strange diagram… Mark two Doubt in your Campaign Log. Remove The Man in the Pallid Mask from the game. Advance to Act 3a - Leading the Way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - At the end of the round, if The Gate to Hell is in play: Discard the location that is farthest from The Gate to Hell. Move each investigator and enemy that was at that location to a connecting location and deal 2 damage to each of them. Objective - If each undefeated investigator is at The Gate to Hell, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ignore the Forced ability on Blocked Passage. Objective - If each undefeated investigator is at Blocked Passage, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When The Gate to Hell is revealed: Put the top 2 Catacombs in the Catacombs deck into play above and below The Gate to Hell.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ignore the text on unrevealed locations adjacent to Stone Archways. Forced - When Stone Archways is revealed: Put the topmost Catacombs in the Catacombs deck into play to the right of Stone Archways.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: Crypt of the Sepulchral Lamp is investigated using ά instead of the skill indicated by the investigation attempt. Forced - When Crypt of the Sepulchral Lamp is revealed: Put the top 2 Catacombs in the Catacombs deck into play above and to the right of Crypt of the Sepulchral Lamp.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are investigating Bone-Filled Cavern, you have 1 fewer hand slot. Forced - When Bone-Filled Cavern is revealed: Put the top 2 Catacombs in the Catacombs deck into play below and to the right of Bone-Filled Cavern.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you end your turn at Well of Souls: You must either take 1 direct horror or discard 2 random cards from your hand. Forced - When Well of Souls is revealed: Put the topmost Catacombs in the Catacombs deck into play above, below, or to the right of Well of Souls.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Test έ (3) to read an ancient sign. If you succeed, look at the revealed side of any Catacombs location in play. (Group limit once per game.) Forced - When Candlelit Tunnels is revealed: Put the top 2 Catacombs in the Catacombs deck into play to the left and right of Candlelit Tunnels.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When Labyrinth of Bones is revealed: Put the top 3 Catacombs in the Catacombs deck into play above, below, and to the right of Labyrinth of Bones.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When you would move from Narrow Shaft to an unrevealed location: Test ί (3). If you fail, take 1 damage and cancel the effects of the move. Forced - When Narrow Shaft is revealed: Put the topmost Catacombs in the Catacombs deck into play above or to the right of Narrow Shaft.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you end your turn at Shivering Pools: You must either take 1 direct damage or lose 5 resources. Forced - When Shivering Pools is revealed: Put the topmost Catacombs in the Catacombs deck into play below or to the right of Shivering Pools.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When you reveal Blocked Passage: Take 2 damage. You cannot leave Blocked Passage this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to enter Catacombs, investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When Tomb of Shadows is revealed: Advance to act 1b. While The Man in the Pallid Mask is at the Tomb of Shadows, he gets +1π health and cannot be defeated by his η ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - Nearest unrevealed location. η: Parley. Test έ (4) to interpret the guide's ravings. If you succeed, look at the revealed side of any Catacombs location in play. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - Discard a Humanoid enemy at any location and spawn Corpse Dweller at that location (if there are no Humanoid enemies in play, discard Corpse Dweller and it gains surge instead). Hunter. Retaliate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (3). For each point you fail by, take 1 horror. When assigning horror from this effect, it must be divided as evenly as possible among eligible cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put The Shadow Behind You into play in your threat area. Limit 1 per investigator. η: You look behind you. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you did not perform the above η ability: You must either discard all of your resources or discard all cards in your hand. Then, discard The Shadow Behind You.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Attach to your location if there is no copy of The Pit Below attached (if there is, discard The Pit Below and it gains surge instead). Attached location gets +1 shroud. Forced - At the end of the round: Each investigator at attached location takes 3 damage. Discard The Pit Below.
